html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-06862018-06-06,  ,  ,  PMO, 
ActInquiries Act
SubjectExtension - National Inquiry into Missing and Murdered Indigenous Women and Girls
PrecisOrder directing that a COMMISSION do issue under Part I of the INQUIRIES ACT and under the Great Seal of Canada amending the commission in relation to the National Inquiry into Missing and Murdered Indigenous Women and Girls, issued pursuant to Order in Council P.C. 2016-736 of August 2, 2016 by: (1) Replacing "December 31, 2018" with "June 30, 2019" in the paragraph preceding paragraph (a); (2) Replacing "five" by "four" in the paragraph preceding paragraph (a); (3) Removing "Marilyn Poitras" in the paragraph preceding paragraph (a); (4) Adding the following after paragraph (d): (d.1) authorize the Commissioner s to conduct hearings until no later than December 31, 2018; and (5) Replacing "November 1, 2018" with "April 30, 2019" in paragraph (x)(ii).
AttachmentsAttachment
